title: Government Waste Reduction Act of 2013
content: Government Waste Reduction Act of 2013 - Establishes the Independent Government Waste Reduction Board, the membership of which shall include individuals with national recognition for expertise in agencies, waste reduction, finance and economics, and actuarial sciences. Requires the Board to submit to Congress and the President a report that advises specific implementation of the recommendations from the March 2011 Government Accountability Office (GAO) report quot. Opportunities to Reduce Potential Duplication in Government Programs, Save Tax Dollars, and Enhance Revenuequot, and the February 2012 GAO report quot. Opportunities to Reduce Duplication, Overlap and Fragmentation, Achieve Savings, and Enhance Revenue. quot, Sets forth procedures for congressional consideration of the Board's recommendations.
